summary: TMUV is a mosquito-borne flavivirus which belongs to the flaviviridae family. TMUV genome encodes a single polyprotein which is cleaved into three structural proteins (C, prM and E) and seven non-structural proteins (NS1, NS2A, NS2B, NS3, NS4A, NS4B and NS5) NS1 protein contains multiple protective protective T-cell and B-cell epitopes which can induce both humoral and cell-mediated immunity without the risk of antibody-dependent enhancement. NS1 protein of flavivirus has more virus-specific epitopes than cross-reactive ones in contrast to E protein which has more cross-reactive than specific epitopes. penicillin and 100 mg/mL streptomycin (Solarbio, Beijing, China) the SDSG strain was isolated from a duck farm in Shandong province in 2013. 6-week-old mice were immunized with TMUV NS1 protein and Freund’s adjuvant. three days after final immunization, mice were euthanized by carbon dioxide. fusion cells were fused with sp2/0 murine myeloma cells. the characteristics of monoclonal antibodies were identified using Pierce Rapid Isotyping Kit (Thermo, Rockford, IL, USA) the cell supernatants and ascitic fluids were respectively diluted from 1:10 to 1:20480. the titers of diluted antibodies peptides were amplified. the concentrations of purified proteins were measured by a BSA Protein Assay Kit. each well of 96-well plates was coated with purified fusion proteins. the plates were blocked with 5% skimmed milk for 2 h at 37°C. cells supernatants of different hybridomas were added to each well. fusion proteins were subjected to gel electrophoresis on 12% SDS-PAGE. the membrane was blocked with 5% skimmed milk overnight at 4°C. after washing three times with TBST, the membranes were immersed in a goat anti-duck or anti-mouse HRP-conjugated serum. blocking ELISA Each well of 96 well plates was coated with purified NS1 protein in 0.1 M carbonate buffer (pH 9.6) and incubated at 4°C overnight. after washing three times with PBST, mouse positive serum against TMUV NS1 protein was added to wells and incubated at 37°C for 1h. cellulose membrane was blocked with 5% skimmed milk at 37°C for 2h. after washing three times with TBST, membranes were colored in DAB liquid. running water was used to stop the reaction. inant plasmid pET-28 -NS1 and control plasmid pET-28a(+) were transformed into BL21 cells and induced by isopropyl-thiogalac-topyranoside. after induction, bacterial cells were centrifugated and washed with phosphate buffered saline (PBS, pH 7.4) loma cells using 50% polyethylene glycol (PEG 4000, Sigma) were cultured selectively in DMEM/high glucose containing 10% fetal bovine serum, 100 mM hypoxanthine, 16 mM thymidine and 400 mM aminopterin. on day five, 50L of HAT medium was added additionally in each cell of the 96 cell plates. the fusion proteins were identified by SDS-PAGE and purified by Pierce GST Protein Interaction Pull-Down Kit according to the manufacturer’s instructions. the concentrations of purified proteins were measured by a BSA Protein Assay Kit (Kang Wei, China) ten pairs of primers were designed according to the shortened peptide sequences. one or two amino acid residues were removed from the carboxy terminal of the peptide. each well of 96-well plates was coated with purified fusion proteins. after washing, cell supernatants of different hybridomas were added to each well. after washing, a goat anti-mouse HRP-conjugated polyclonal serum diluted 1:5000 with 5% skimmed milk was added. 2M H2SO4 was used to stop the reaction and the absorbance was recorded at 450 nm by a microplate absorbance reader. 96-well plates were coated with recombinant protein NS1 and BL21 (DE3) cells containing plasmid pET-28a(+ respectively. cells were separated into a 24 well plate and inoculated with TMUV (103.5 ELD50/0.2mL duck embryo allantoic fluid) cells were fixed with methanol and acetone (1:1) for 20 min at -20°C. after washing three times with PBS, cells were inoculated with goat anti-mouse IgG(H+L) with FITC conjugate. P-conjugated polyclonal serum diluted 1:5000 with 5% skimmed milk was added and incubated for 1 h at 37°C for 1 h. 2M H2SO4 was used to stop the reaction and the absorbance was recorded at 450 nm by a microplate absorbance reader. mAb could strongly recognize native NS1 protein of TMUV and recombinant NS1 protein. mAb was named 3G2 which belonged to the subtype of IgG2a. inhibition rate of mouse positive serum against TMUV NS1 protein to mAb 3G2 was 69.34%. monoclonal antibody was used to perform IFA on TMUV-infected cells. BHK-21 cells infected with TMUV yielded significant fluorescence with six MAbs in the cytoplasm. mAb 3G2 can react with NS1-27-F-2, NS1-27-F-4, NS1-27-F-6, NS1-27-F-7, NS1-27-F-8 and NS1-27-R-2 oligopeptides, while not with NS1-27-F-9, NS1-27-R-3, NS1-27-R-4 and NS1-27-R-6. nitrocellulose membranes spotted six oligopeptides of NS1-27-R-2, NS1-27-F-2, NS1-27-F-4, NS1-27-F-6, NS1-27-F-7 and NS1-27-F-8. the results of indirect ELISA were consistent with the results of indirect ELISA. results showed that the B-cell epitope of 269DEKEIV274 was highly conserved and the amino acid homology was 100% among 24 TMUV strains. the sequence alignment was performed among other flaviviruses such as JEV, DENV, WNV, YFV, BAGV, and MVEV isolates. deNV3 AY496874 H L G K L E DENV4 AF161266 H L G K L E YFV JX898880 M Q V P L E Dots indicate identical amino acids. production of MAbs against TMUV NS1 protein was successfully expressed in BL21 (DE3) and highest expression level emerged at 5 hours after induction with 1mM IPTG. Western-blot identification Lane M, Blue plusIIprotein Marker (14-120kda, Transgen Biotech); Lane 1, The band of NS1-His fusion protein was visualized with TMUV-positive duck serum. Lane 2, Control, His-tag didn’t react with TMUV-positive duck serum. mouse serum against TMUV NS1 protein and normal mouse serum were used as positive and negative controls. each sample was detected in triplicate. Error bars were expressed as standard deviation of the means. NS1-27 polypeptide was truncated from carboxy and amino terminals of NS1-27. nitrocellulose membranes spotted six oligopeptides of NS1-27-R-2, NS1-27-F-2, NS1-27-F-4, NS1-27-F-6, NS1-27-F-7 and NS1-27-F-8. the NS1-27 epitope of 269DEKEIV274 was highly conserved. the amino acid homology of the epitope was below 50% among other flaviviruses. NS1-27 epitope had high specificity among other flaviviruses. flavivirus strain Accession number Peptide sequence(NS1-27) byd1 JQ92042 D E K E I V BAGV AY632545 - - R D - T JEV FJ495189 - - N G - - MVE AF161266 - - E D E K WNV JF488093 - - G R V E DENV1 AY762084 H L G K L E DENV2 EF051521 TMUV NS1-specific mAb was acquired with prokaryotic expression NS1 protein of TMUV. a pane of 16-AA polypeptides of NS1 protein was expressed. one 16-AA polypeptide NS1-27 was screened and identified by 3G2 mAb. cell epitope of 269DEKEIV274 was confirmed by probing the shortened oligopeptide proteins with 3G2 mAb. NS1-27 epitope of 269DEKEIV274 was highly conserved among TMUV strains. compared with other flavivirus, the epitope had less 50% identity.
